nodes.text: The occupation of Mon Cala was the Galactic Empire's occupation of the planet Mon Cala, which began after the invasion of Mon Cala, after Mon Calamari King Lee-Char incited a war on Mon Cala. During the occupation, Ardo Barodai worked as a bartender where he eavesdropped on Imperial officers and passed on intelligence to the rebellion. Th occupation was thwarted when the Mon Calamari and Quarren joined together and destroyed the Imperial garrison.
